headline: Online Tip
subtitle: You Can Always Watch Them
content:
Los Santos is full of excitement and drama available for your viewing pleasure. Sit back, relax and watch your Friends on their own adventures via ‘Friend Spectate’ – simply highlight any friend in the Friends tab who is currently playing GTA Online and select ‘Spectate Player.’

Enable or disable the option for allowing Friends to Spectate in the Online > Options menu.

Remember, you can always watch them… though they will know.
